last_episode_to_air.name: Part 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Part 1 introduces you to the world of  Detachment through an unlikely group.

name: Detachment
overview: Detachment is a remotely filmed international web-series which takes an anthology style approach in a time of crisis, a time where the world is falling apart at the seams. This looks at how different people deal with that. We open in the midst of an ongoing event but we jump about the timeline as we build the story of this falling race.
